column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk Province:------ According to a Facebook post
column4: Chinese man was found dead near a boulevard in Borey Koch Asia at 10:00 am
column9: Sihanoukville.------The man was named as Niu Shuangsuo
column11: according to a security source in Borei Kochi Asia. Before the incident he went to buy food when a group of children ran to tell him that a Chinese man was lying on the ground. The security guard went to see
column12: and found he had died and contacted authorities. ------No more details are known. ------KBN------UPDATE: Cause of death was recorded as a heart attack
